statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + 1 , 2 \, x^{3} + 10 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x - 10 , 4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 4 , -x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x + 1 , -7 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
